npc_output: I am a witch, nice to meet you.
I'm feeling a bit sad and bored, thanks for asking.
Actually, I need to crush the fragrant tincture after rain, |r1|.
I'm a tailor, I sew and mend clothes.
Not much, just getting ready to deliver some messages, |r1|.
It's going well, just trying to trade some valuable goods, |r1|.
Just enjoying the windy weather, it's nice to be out at dawn.
Actually, I'd love to catch the early catch before the storm, |r1|.
I'm researching for a lecture, trying to teach the learned study at night, |r1|.
I'm a farmer, I sow the fresh soil at the field, |r1|.
